detail_desc: Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative metal button at the cuffs. No fasteners. Lined.
Sleeveless jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a ribbed polo neck and narrow ribbing around the armholes and hem.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft rib knit. The hat has a pompom on top and turn-up at the hem.
Off-the-shoulder dress in stretch jersey containing glittery threads with long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.

Fancy dress costume in jersey with a mask that will transform you into a spooky skeleton with shimmering bones. The costume has long sleeves, long legs and a hook and loop fastening at the back. The mask has an elasticated hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with embroidered and hard-worn details in a loose fit. High waist, low crotch, button fly and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a high slit and gathered elastication at the front for a gentle draped effect. High waist with a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and elbow patches in a contrasting colour.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut, knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Unlined.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a square neckline front and back, smocked bodice and long puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the shoulders and cuffs.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a decorative opening at the top, a concealed zip at the back and long, wide sleeves with cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Maxi dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck front and back and a concealed zip at the back. Short sleeves, a seam at the waist and a slit at the front. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in a linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Flap chest pockets and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short dress in organic linen with a voluminous bodice. Deep V-neck with pleats either side, a wrapover top, and smocking details on the shoulders and under the bust. Long balloon sleeves with pleats for added volume and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Richly detailed back with an opening and pleats, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a fitted skirt. Lined in an organic cotton weave.
Short skirt in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a concealed zip in one side. The skirt in flared to the hem with a thin ball-chain trim at the hem. Lined.

Patterned blouse in an airy weave with a frilled collar and buttons down the front with a double-frilled trim. Long sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and covered buttons at the cuffs. Rounded hem.
Metal earrings in different designs. Length approx. 4 cm.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with an interactive motif.
Shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed turtle neck, long dolman sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Pyjamas with a shirt top and bottoms in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with an embroidery detail on the chest and buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, a yoke at the back, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a scalloped hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Knee-length skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, visible zip at the back and slit at the front. Lined.
Lightly padded gilet with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and a short frill trim at the hem. Detachable, lined hood with a short frill trim. Lined.

Lightly padded popover jacket in woven fabric with sections in sturdy jersey. Lined, elasticated hood, stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs at the top. Side pockets and wide ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Ankle boots in suede with a loop at the top of each side, warm pile lining and insoles and rubber soles.
Double-layered hat with a turned-up hem.
Short dress in satin with a V-neck, wide butterfly sleeves and a narrow tie at the waist. Unlined.
Round handbag in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. Two handles and a zip at the top, a narrow shoulder strap and an inner compartment. Lined. Width 6 cm, diameter 25 cm.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short, lace cap sleeves.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, welt chest pockets and pockets in the side seams. Short, wide sleeves, a detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back and elasticated hem. Lined at the front.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Brazilian briefs in soft jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and no buttons.
Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and gently rounded hem.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.

Padded jacket in a patterned weave with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets with a press-stud, narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs, and concealed elastication at the hem. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in soft, jacquard-knit organic cotton. Jumper with a round neckline, buttons at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared, asymmetric skirt. Jersey lining.
Bikini top with a lined, shaped front, wide shoulder straps and wide elastication at the hem. Wide metal fastening at the back.
Fine-knit hat in a soft cotton blend with a roll-edge hem.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a soft weave with a detachable tie belt, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Pleats at the top, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Fabric cap with a motif. Adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Push-up bras in soft cotton jersey with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Thong briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.

Short-sleeved polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. The shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
5-pocket shorts in cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, button fly, low crotch and straight, wide legs.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Calf-length skirt in airy patterned chiffon with a concealed zip, hook-and-eye fastening at the back, two seams and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined at the top.
Small pouch bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top. Size approx. 4.5x5.5x7.5 cm.
Knee-length dress in airy viscose with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with a concealed silicone trim at the top and long sleeves.Overlocked edges at the top, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a picot trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Backpack in woven fabric that can easily double up as a tote bag. Two handles at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps that unclip at the bottom to be stored in the outer compartment at the back. Hook-and-eye fastening and a zip at the top, a padded laptop sleeve on the inside, a smaller outer compartment on one short side and a large outer compartment with a zip at the front. Lightly padded base. Size approx. 14x30x43 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, fake pocket at the top, partially concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Fitted top in soft ribbed jersey with a wide neckline and extra-long sleeves with thumbholes.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, rib-knit organic cotton with buttons at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester.
